scripts.build: lein with-profile publish cljsbuild once && cp -rT npmfiles public/javascript/maximoplus-core/
scripts.buildnative: lein with-profile rnprod cljsbuild once && cp -rT npmfilesnative public/javascript/react-native-prod
scripts.builddev: lein cljsbuild once && cp -rT npmfiles public/javascript/maximoplus-core/
